title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 117.2 - Income from partnership included in New York adjusted gross income
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 117.2 - Income from partnership included in New York adjusted gross income

State Regulations
A resident partner's distributive share of partnership
income is included in his Federal adjusted gross income and, therefore, is
included in his New York adjusted gross income, subject to certain
modifications described in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
117.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
